entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Small refactoring in DbContextFactorySource<TContext>.CreateActivator static method | Reduce condition nesting #27339
  • Bulk import for efficient importing of data from the client into the database #27333
  • `The 'bool' property 'X' on entity type 'Y' is configured with a database-generated default` for type: `bit` #27332
  • Why do IQueryables produced by methods other than OrderBy(Descending) satisfy the `is IOrderedQueryable` condition? #27330
  • Calling setter for ICollection of navigation properties #27329
  • Support IMutableNavigation.SetJsonPropertyName/IReadOnlyNavigation.GetJsonPropertyName - CosmosDB Provider #27328
  • `Include()` in EF Core adds more items to list than are in database #27327

Closed

  • First migration rollback does not delete the __EFMigrationsHistory table #27300
  • Allow to customize an alias in model binding #27296
  • Support for EF Core 3.1 on .NET Framework #27294
  • How to Delete Children Of Parent manually from db with deletion behaviour Cascade Delete with required FK? #27286
  • InvalidOperationException with HasPeriodStart and InMemoryDatabase #27277
  • Aps #27250
  • Context Prematurely Disposed While In Scope #27246
  • Seeding one-to-many relationships #27208
  • ValueConverterAttribute for Smart Enums and simple Value Objects #27313

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27338
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27337
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27336
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Allow migration tests to specify migrations options #27331

Merged

  • [release/2.1] Move off expiring machine pools #26794
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, auto-merge
  • [release/6.0] Update build and test machines #27238
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/5.0] Stop building w/ VS2017 in CI #27236
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/3.1] Stop building w/ VS2017 in CI #27235
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update branding to 5.0.15 #27334
  • Update branding to 6.0.3 #27335

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27072 - Suboptimal SQL generation for query with optional navigation, its collection navigation and lateral join #27302
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
